# Flächenberechung {#sec-area}

*Version vom `r format(Sys.time(), '%B %d, %Y um %H:%M:%S')`*

![](images/caution.png){fig-align="center" width="50%"}

F = Fläche

U = Umfang

## Quadrat

$$
F = a \cdot a = a^2
$$
$$
U = 4 \cdot a
$$
$$
d = a \sqrt{2} = \sqrt{2\cdot a ^2}
$$

## Rechteck

$$
F = a \cdot b 
$$

$$
U = 2 \cdot a + 2 \cdot b = a (a+b)
$$

$$
d = \sqrt{a^2 + b^2} 
$$
## Trapez

$$
F = m \cdot h = \cfrac{a+b}{2}\cdot h 
$$

$$
U = a+b+c+d
$$

## Parallelogramm

$$
F = a \cdot h 
$$

$$
U = 2(a+b)
$$
